p: The condensate gas from Well YK1, located at north of China is composed of 87.368% methane, 3.570% ethane and 0.718% propane etc. CO 2 has purity up to 99.95%. The physical properties of condensate gas are listed in Table 2. The experimental conditions are that in the YKL gas reservoir (at 43.5 MPa and 132.18 °C).
